verses.text: \w Nebuchadnezzar|strong="H5019"\w* \w king|strong="H4428"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* Babylon \w made|strong="H4427"\w* \w Zedekiah|strong="H6667"\w* \w son|strong="H1121"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w Josiah|strong="H2977"\w* \w the|strong="H8478"\w* \w king|strong="H4428"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w Judah|strong="H3063"\w*, \w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w he|strong="H3063"\w* \w reigned|strong="H4427"\w* \w in|strong="H4428"\w* \w place|strong="H8478"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w Coniah|strong="H3659"\w* \f + \fr 37:1 \ft Coniah is a variant of Jehoiachin.\f* \w son|strong="H1121"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w Jehoiakim|strong="H3079"\w*.

\w But|strong="H3808"\w* \w he|strong="H1931"\w* \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w his|strong="H3068"\w* \w officers|strong="H5650"\w* \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H8085"\w* \w people|strong="H5971"\w* \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H8085"\w* land \w refused|strong="H3808"\w* \w to|strong="H1696"\w* \w obey|strong="H8085"\w* \w the|strong="H8085"\w* \w words|strong="H1697"\w* \w that|strong="H5971"\w* \w the|strong="H8085"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w* \w had|strong="H3068"\w* \w spoken|strong="H1696"\w* \w through|strong="H3027"\w* \w Jeremiah|strong="H3414"\w* \w the|strong="H8085"\w* \w prophet|strong="H5030"\w*.

\w Yet|strong="H3068"\w* \w King|strong="H4428"\w* \w Zedekiah|strong="H6667"\w* \w sent|strong="H7971"\w* \w Jehucal|strong="H3081"\w* \f + \fr 37:3 \ft Jehucal is a variant of Jucal; see Jeremiah 38:1.\f* \w son|strong="H1121"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w Shelemiah|strong="H8018"\w* \w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w Zephaniah|strong="H6846"\w* \w the|strong="H3068"\w* \w priest|strong="H3548"\w*, \w the|strong="H3068"\w* \w son|strong="H1121"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w Maaseiah|strong="H4641"\w*, \w to|strong="H3068"\w* \w Jeremiah|strong="H3414"\w* \w the|strong="H3068"\w* \w prophet|strong="H5030"\w* \w with|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H3068"\w* \w message|strong="H3068"\w*, “\w Please|strong="H4994"\w* \w pray|strong="H6419"\w* \w to|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H3068"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w* \w our|strong="H3068"\w* \w God|strong="H3068"\w* \w for|strong="H1157"\w* \w us|strong="H4994"\w*!”

\w Now|strong="H5414"\w* \w Jeremiah|strong="H3414"\w* \w was|strong="H1004"\w* \w free|strong="H3318"\w* \w to|strong="H3318"\w* \w come|strong="H3318"\w* \w and|strong="H1004"\w* \w go|strong="H3318"\w* \w among|strong="H8432"\w* \w the|strong="H5414"\w* \w people|strong="H5971"\w*, \w for|strong="H1004"\w* \w they|strong="H3808"\w* \w had|strong="H5414"\w* \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w yet|strong="H3808"\w* \w put|strong="H5414"\w* \w him|strong="H5414"\w* \w in|strong="H1004"\w* \w prison|strong="H1004"\w*.

\w Pharaoh|strong="H6547"\w*’s \w army|strong="H2428"\w* \w had|strong="H6547"\w* \w left|strong="H3318"\w* \w Egypt|strong="H4714"\w*, \w and|strong="H3389"\w* \w when|strong="H8085"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w Chaldeans|strong="H3778"\w* \f + \fr 37:5 \ft That is, the Babylonians; also in verses 8, 9, 13, and 14\f* \w who|strong="H6547"\w* \w were|strong="H4714"\w* \w besieging|strong="H6696"\w* \w Jerusalem|strong="H3389"\w* \w heard|strong="H8085"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w report|strong="H8088"\w*, \w they|strong="H5921"\w* \w withdrew|strong="H5927"\w* \w from|strong="H3318"\w* \w Jerusalem|strong="H3389"\w*.

\w Then|strong="H1961"\w* \w the|strong="H3068"\w* \w word|strong="H1697"\w* \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H3068"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w* \w came|strong="H1961"\w* \w to|strong="H3068"\w* \w Jeremiah|strong="H3414"\w* \w the|strong="H3068"\w* \w prophet|strong="H5030"\w*:

“\w This|strong="H3541"\w* \w is|strong="H3068"\w* \w what|strong="H3541"\w* \w the|strong="H3541"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w*, \w the|strong="H3541"\w* \w God|strong="H3068"\w* \w of|strong="H4428"\w* \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w*, \w says|strong="H3541"\w* \w that|strong="H3068"\w* \w you|strong="H7971"\w* \w are|strong="H3478"\w* \w to|strong="H7725"\w* tell \w the|strong="H3541"\w* \w king|strong="H4428"\w* \w of|strong="H4428"\w* \w Judah|strong="H3063"\w*, \w who|strong="H3068"\w* \w sent|strong="H7971"\w* \w you|strong="H7971"\w* \w to|strong="H7725"\w* \w Me|strong="H7971"\w*: \w Behold|strong="H2009"\w*, \w Pharaoh|strong="H6547"\w*’s \w army|strong="H2428"\w*, \w which|strong="H3068"\w* \w has|strong="H3068"\w* \w marched|strong="H3318"\w* \w out|strong="H3318"\w* \w to|strong="H7725"\w* \w help|strong="H5833"\w* \w you|strong="H7971"\w*, \w will|strong="H3068"\w* \w go|strong="H3318"\w* \w back|strong="H7725"\w* \w to|strong="H7725"\w* \w its|strong="H7725"\w* own land \w of|strong="H4428"\w* \w Egypt|strong="H4714"\w*.

\w Then|strong="H7725"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w Chaldeans|strong="H3778"\w* \w will|strong="H5892"\w* \w return|strong="H7725"\w* \w and|strong="H7725"\w* \w fight|strong="H3898"\w* \w against|strong="H5921"\w* \w this|strong="H2063"\w* \w city|strong="H5892"\w*. \w They|strong="H5921"\w* \w will|strong="H5892"\w* \w capture|strong="H3920"\w* \w it|strong="H5921"\w* \w and|strong="H7725"\w* \w burn|strong="H8313"\w* \w it|strong="H5921"\w* \w down|strong="H8313"\w*.

\w This|strong="H3541"\w* \w is|strong="H3068"\w* \w what|strong="H3541"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w* \w says|strong="H3541"\w*: \w Do|strong="H3068"\w* \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w deceive|strong="H5377"\w* \w yourselves|strong="H5315"\w* \w by|strong="H5921"\w* saying, ‘\w The|strong="H5921"\w* \w Chaldeans|strong="H3778"\w* \w will|strong="H3068"\w* \w go|strong="H1980"\w* \w away|strong="H3212"\w* \w for|strong="H3588"\w* good,’ \w for|strong="H3588"\w* \w they|strong="H3588"\w* \w will|strong="H3068"\w* \w not|strong="H3808"\w*!

\w Indeed|strong="H3588"\w*, \w if|strong="H3588"\w* \w you|strong="H3588"\w* \w were|strong="H2428"\w* \w to|strong="H6965"\w* \w strike|strong="H5221"\w* \w down|strong="H5221"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w entire|strong="H3605"\w* \w army|strong="H2428"\w* \w of|strong="H5892"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w Chaldeans|strong="H3778"\w* \w that|strong="H3588"\w* \w is|strong="H3605"\w* \w fighting|strong="H3898"\w* \w against|strong="H3898"\w* \w you|strong="H3588"\w*, \w and|strong="H6965"\w* \w only|strong="H3588"\w* \w wounded|strong="H5221"\w* \w men|strong="H2428"\w* \w remained|strong="H7604"\w* \w in|strong="H5892"\w* \w their|strong="H3605"\w* tents, \w they|strong="H3588"\w* \w would|strong="H3605"\w* \w still|strong="H3588"\w* \w get|strong="H6965"\w* \w up|strong="H6965"\w* \w and|strong="H6965"\w* \w burn|strong="H8313"\w* \w this|strong="H2063"\w* \w city|strong="H5892"\w* \w down|strong="H5221"\w*.” Jeremiah Imprisoned

\w When|strong="H1961"\w* \w the|strong="H6440"\w* Chaldean \w army|strong="H2428"\w* \w withdrew|strong="H5927"\w* \w from|strong="H6440"\w* \w Jerusalem|strong="H3389"\w* \w for|strong="H5921"\w* \w fear|strong="H6440"\w* \w of|strong="H6440"\w* \w Pharaoh|strong="H6547"\w*’s \w army|strong="H2428"\w*,

\w Jeremiah|strong="H3414"\w* \w started|strong="H3318"\w* \w to|strong="H3318"\w* \w leave|strong="H3318"\w* \w Jerusalem|strong="H3389"\w* \w to|strong="H3318"\w* \w go|strong="H3212"\w* \w to|strong="H3318"\w* \w the|strong="H8432"\w* land \w of|strong="H8432"\w* \w Benjamin|strong="H1144"\w* \w to|strong="H3318"\w* claim \w his|strong="H8432"\w* \w portion|strong="H2505"\w* \w there|strong="H8033"\w* \f + \fr 37:12 \ft Literally to divide from there\f* \w among|strong="H8432"\w* \w the|strong="H8432"\w* \w people|strong="H5971"\w*.

\w But|strong="H1961"\w* \w when|strong="H1961"\w* \w he|strong="H1931"\w* \w reached|strong="H1961"\w* \w the|strong="H3414"\w* \w Gate|strong="H8179"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w Benjamin|strong="H1144"\w*, \w the|strong="H3414"\w* \w captain|strong="H1167"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w the|strong="H3414"\w* \w guard|strong="H6488"\w*, \w whose|strong="H1121"\w* \w name|strong="H8034"\w* \w was|strong="H8034"\w* \w Irijah|strong="H3376"\w* \w son|strong="H1121"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w Shelemiah|strong="H8018"\w*, \w the|strong="H3414"\w* \w son|strong="H1121"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w Hananiah|strong="H2608"\w*, \w seized|strong="H8610"\w* \w him|strong="H1931"\w* \w and|strong="H1121"\w* said, “\w You|strong="H1961"\w* \w are|strong="H1121"\w* \w deserting|strong="H5307"\w* \w to|strong="H1961"\w* \w the|strong="H3414"\w* \w Chaldeans|strong="H3778"\w*!”

“\w That|strong="H8085"\w* \w is|strong="H8085"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* \w lie|strong="H8267"\w*,” \w Jeremiah|strong="H3414"\w* replied. “\w I|strong="H5921"\w* am \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w deserting|strong="H5307"\w* \w to|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w Chaldeans|strong="H3778"\w*!” \w But|strong="H3808"\w* \w Irijah|strong="H3376"\w* would \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w listen|strong="H8085"\w* \w to|strong="H5921"\w* \w him|strong="H5921"\w*; \w instead|strong="H3808"\w*, \w he|strong="H3808"\w* \w arrested|strong="H8610"\w* \w Jeremiah|strong="H3414"\w* \w and|strong="H8085"\w* \w took|strong="H8610"\w* \w him|strong="H5921"\w* \w to|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w officials|strong="H8269"\w*.

\w The|strong="H5921"\w* \w officials|strong="H8269"\w* \w were|strong="H8269"\w* \w angry|strong="H7107"\w* \w with|strong="H1004"\w* \w Jeremiah|strong="H3414"\w*, \w and|strong="H1004"\w* \w they|strong="H3588"\w* \w beat|strong="H5221"\w* \w him|strong="H5414"\w* \w and|strong="H1004"\w* \w placed|strong="H5414"\w* \w him|strong="H5414"\w* \w in|strong="H5921"\w* \w jail|strong="H1004"\w* \w in|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w house|strong="H1004"\w* \w of|strong="H1004"\w* \w Jonathan|strong="H3083"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w scribe|strong="H5608"\w*, \w for|strong="H3588"\w* \w it|strong="H5414"\w* \w had|strong="H3588"\w* been \w made|strong="H6213"\w* \w into|strong="H5921"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* \w prison|strong="H1004"\w*.

\w So|strong="H3588"\w* \w Jeremiah|strong="H3414"\w* \w went|strong="H3414"\w* into \w a|strong="H3068"\w* \w cell|strong="H2588"\w* \w in|strong="H3427"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* \w dungeon|strong="H1004"\w* \w and|strong="H3117"\w* \w remained|strong="H3427"\w* \w there|strong="H8033"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* \w long|strong="H3117"\w* \w time|strong="H3117"\w*.

Later, \w King|strong="H4428"\w* \w Zedekiah|strong="H6667"\w* \w sent|strong="H7971"\w* \w for|strong="H3027"\w* \w Jeremiah|strong="H3414"\w* \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w received|strong="H3947"\w* \w him|strong="H5414"\w* \w in|strong="H3068"\w* \w his|strong="H5414"\w* \w palace|strong="H1004"\w*, \w where|strong="H1004"\w* \w he|strong="H3068"\w* \w asked|strong="H7592"\w* \w him|strong="H5414"\w* \w privately|strong="H5643"\w*, “\w Is|strong="H3068"\w* \w there|strong="H3426"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* \w word|strong="H1697"\w* \w from|strong="H3027"\w* \w the|strong="H5414"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w*?” “\w There|strong="H3426"\w* \w is|strong="H3068"\w*,” \w Jeremiah|strong="H3414"\w* replied. “\w You|strong="H5414"\w* \w will|strong="H3068"\w* \w be|strong="H3426"\w* \w delivered|strong="H5414"\w* \w into|strong="H3027"\w* \w the|strong="H5414"\w* \w hand|strong="H3027"\w* \w of|strong="H4428"\w* \w the|strong="H5414"\w* \w king|strong="H4428"\w* \w of|strong="H4428"\w* Babylon.”

\w Then|strong="H2088"\w* \w Jeremiah|strong="H3414"\w* \w asked|strong="H4100"\w* \w King|strong="H4428"\w* \w Zedekiah|strong="H6667"\w*, “\w How|strong="H4100"\w* \w have|strong="H5971"\w* \w I|strong="H3588"\w* \w sinned|strong="H2398"\w* \w against|strong="H2398"\w* \w you|strong="H3588"\w* \w or|strong="H1004"\w* \w your|strong="H5414"\w* \w servants|strong="H5650"\w* \w or|strong="H1004"\w* \w these|strong="H2088"\w* \w people|strong="H5971"\w*, \w that|strong="H3588"\w* \w you|strong="H3588"\w* \w have|strong="H5971"\w* \w put|strong="H5414"\w* \w me|strong="H5414"\w* \w in|strong="H1004"\w* \w prison|strong="H1004"\w*?

\w Where|strong="H5921"\w* \w are|strong="H5030"\w* \w your|strong="H5921"\w* \w prophets|strong="H5030"\w* \w who|strong="H5030"\w* \w prophesied|strong="H5012"\w* \w to|strong="H5921"\w* \w you|strong="H5921"\w*, claiming, ‘\w The|strong="H5921"\w* \w king|strong="H4428"\w* \w of|strong="H4428"\w* Babylon \w will|strong="H4428"\w* \w not|strong="H3808"\w* come \w against|strong="H5921"\w* \w you|strong="H5921"\w* \w or|strong="H3808"\w* \w this|strong="H2063"\w* land’?

\w But|strong="H3808"\w* \w now|strong="H6258"\w* \w please|strong="H4994"\w* \w listen|strong="H8085"\w*, \w O|strong="H3068"\w* \w my|strong="H8085"\w* lord \w the|strong="H6440"\w* \w king|strong="H4428"\w*. \w May|strong="H4994"\w* \w my|strong="H8085"\w* \w petition|strong="H8467"\w* \w come|strong="H7725"\w* \w before|strong="H6440"\w* \w you|strong="H6440"\w*. \w Do|strong="H4994"\w* \w not|strong="H3808"\w* send \w me|strong="H6440"\w* \w back|strong="H7725"\w* \w to|strong="H7725"\w* \w the|strong="H6440"\w* \w house|strong="H1004"\w* \w of|strong="H4428"\w* \w Jonathan|strong="H3083"\w* \w the|strong="H6440"\w* \w scribe|strong="H5608"\w*, \w or|strong="H3808"\w* \w I|strong="H6258"\w* \w will|strong="H4428"\w* \w die|strong="H4191"\w* \w there|strong="H8033"\w*.”

\w So|strong="H4480"\w* \w King|strong="H4428"\w* \w Zedekiah|strong="H6667"\w* \w gave|strong="H5414"\w* \w orders|strong="H6680"\w* \w for|strong="H5704"\w* \w Jeremiah|strong="H3414"\w* \w to|strong="H5704"\w* \w be|strong="H3117"\w* \w placed|strong="H5414"\w* \w in|strong="H3427"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w courtyard|strong="H2691"\w* \w of|strong="H4428"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w guard|strong="H4307"\w* \w and|strong="H4428"\w* \w given|strong="H5414"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* \w loaf|strong="H3603"\w* \w of|strong="H4428"\w* \w bread|strong="H3899"\w* \w daily|strong="H3117"\w* \w from|strong="H4480"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w street|strong="H2351"\w* \w of|strong="H4428"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* bakers, \w until|strong="H5704"\w* \w all|strong="H3605"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w bread|strong="H3899"\w* \w in|strong="H3427"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w city|strong="H5892"\w* \w was|strong="H5892"\w* \w gone|strong="H8552"\w*. \w So|strong="H4480"\w* \w Jeremiah|strong="H3414"\w* \w remained|strong="H3427"\w* \w in|strong="H3427"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w courtyard|strong="H2691"\w* \w of|strong="H4428"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w guard|strong="H4307"\w*.
